name: Terrence Higgins Trust
memberOrga: We do not have member organisations
goal:
THT's vision
A world where people with HIV live healthy lives free from prejudice and discrimination, and good
sexual health is a right and reality for all.
Our mission
• To end the transmission of HIV.
• To empower and support people living with HIV to lead healthy lives.
• To amplify the voices of those affected by HIV across public and political arenas to eradicate
stigma and discrimination.
• To enable people to enjoy good sexual health.
euInitiatives: We are not directly involved in influencing on an EU level.  We do participate in European level meetings on topics like PrEP and HIV testing.
